#define size 300
char a[size], b[size][size];
void precompute(){}
void doThis(){
    	int column, x, row, k, z;
	si(column);
	getchar();
    while(column!=0){
	ss(a);
	DB2(column,a);
	int x =strlen(a);
	row=x/column;
	FOR(i,0,row){
        k=(i+1)*column;
        z=k;
            if(i%2==0){
                FOR(j,0,column){
                    b[i][j]=a[z-column];
                    z++;
                }
            }

            if(i%2!=0){
                FOR(j,0,column){
                    b[i][j]=a[z-1];
                    z--;
                }
            }
	}
	FOR(i,0,column){
	    FOR(j,0,row){
	        cout<<b[j][i];
	    }
	}
	pnl;
	si(column);
	getchar();
    }
}
